flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It grips prey with its tail claws
and injects poison. It tenaciously
hangs on until the poison takes.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It lives in arid lands. It buries
itself in sand and lies in wait for
unsuspecting prey.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
As soon as the tail claws close,
its needle tips secrete poison.
It can survive a year without food.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It burrows under the sand to lie in
wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject
its prey with a savage poison.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
It burrows under the sand to lie in
wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject
its prey with a savage poison.
flavor_text_entries.black:
As soon as the tail claws close,
its needle tips secrete poison.
It can survive a year without food.
flavor_text_entries.white:
As soon as the tail claws close,
its needle tips secrete poison.
It can survive a year without food.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It lives in arid regions and
can go without food for a year
while waiting for prey.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It lives in arid regions and
can go without food for a year
while waiting for prey.
flavor_text_entries.x:

It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:

Its tail claws can inject its prey with a
savage poison.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently
for prey to come near. This Pokémon and
Sizzlipede share common descent.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It attacks using the claws on its tail. Once locked
in its grip, its prey is unable to move as this
Pokémon’s poison seeps in.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Its claws are not only razor-sharp but poisonous, making Skorupi
a highly dangerous Pokémon. It seems to be weakened by cold
temperatures, however.
